page.title: 16HOUSES
page.content: Most of the houses in our area are less than thirty years old.The houses nearest the school are all part of a large council estate.There are two and three bedroomed family homes and one bedroomed flats and bungalows specially designed for old age pensioners or people living alone.The roads on the estate are narrow because the architects never anticipated ordinary people owning cars and there are very few garages. The boom in electricial goods has meant that many people have had more sockets fitted to their homes as the houses only had two electric sockets downstairs when they were built.Each house has a front and back garden and like the houses themselves they are very well cared for.The estate looks very good and certainly does not look as old as it is.
